```{r}
library(e1071)
```

```{r}
m = svm(eruptions ~ ., data = faithful)
print(m)
plot(m)
```

```{r}
pred = predict(m, faithful)
plot(eruptions ~ ., data = faithful)
plot(pred ~ faithful$waiting)
plot(pred ~ faithful$eruptions)
```
